TopicTitle: [1.12.X] Tantares - Stockalike Soyuz and MIR [16.1][28.05.2024][{Proton Revamp]

Articles.Content:
Have you considered making the Dragon spacecraft? After all, Cygnus is in the pack, so why not add the other commercial spacecraft that services the ISS?

I like the Dragon and yeah, it fits somewhat naturally in with the ATV and Cygnus. But, as SpiderVise says, tygoo7 is already working on a brilliant stockalike Dragon V2 and I would really recommend checking that out!

The Dragon V1? Now that is a maybe... Some day

Also the HTV. My Fuji needs another companion from the land of Japan!

They're really fun little ships! These ones all have a TWR of at least 1, so landing isn't too difficult. I wasn't really aware they were a thing either, until I started to checkout some of the Jool-5 challenge entries. This guy in particular made some impressivly tiny ion ships: tiny ion explorers .

You mean a TWR of 1 on Kerbin?

Aha, but that is really nice, thanks for the info

I for sure must take one of these on my next voyage to Minmus!

(I am rather fond of ION engines, or resistojets, I can leave them doing the long burns while I do my work)

Energia:

I would like to say, the Energia will be released outside of Tantares...

But, also, I think this opens the door for me to consider an N1 in Tantares! After the holiday season, likely.

I'd just like to throw a "thank you" out.

I can't tell you how long I was looking for a simple spherical command pod to use as a Vostok look-alike - and then I found this thread ... Other than procedural fairings, this is the only mod I use (though admittedly, I don't use all of it - only the vostok, soyuz, and R-7 parts).

Trust me, I'm a "stock" purist and that's a HUGE compliment. Looking forward to seeing what you come up with for the N-1 after the holiday season.

Hi!

It is, I think, just behind the release of the TLV, so a little out of date, it will not support the TLV, Shenzou or Fuji.

I have incorporated a few of Eagleshifts changes into Tantares proper (mainly changes to ElectricCharge amounts), but I still have not had the time to go through everything.

Hope this helps.

It's likely you're experiencing the bug with the tracker KerbalStuff uses, it can pick up extreme numbers of phantom hits and has done this for a couple months now. If you go through the download stats for popular mods you'll likely see the same thing there, I know Stockalike has been hit by it.

It's a little annoying since it renders the graph rather unusable due to the scaling down of all the real stats to fit in the giant bump from phantom hits.

EDIT: Source

Man, Realism Overhaul is hard! I've miserably failed docking two Soyuzes "Soyuz-1 and Soyuz-2" style with crew transfer, I've got enough fuel only to change inclination and make a 1.5 km rendez-vous. At least, everyone survived and landed near Baikonur (my Soyuz-3) and on the Volga bank (my Soyuz-2)

Dats how we fly in RO, with tons of data.

Check it here.

Thanks for the kind words Beale. Development is on hold for the moment but I will try to resume progress during Christmas break.

Proton.

I ask people, how would you feel about the Proton's third stage tank being halved in length? It would make the dimensions more in line with the real one.

This also, along with re-painting the thing white, to be more in line with the TLV.

yeah the Proton thrid stage ... i told you months ago that i could be half the length

when you reduce the length of teh tank, it rely looks more like teh real life Proton. a white repaint? same paintjob like on the R-7 ? if yes, then do it !

That would indeed be a good idea. Also, get rid of the truss interstage on it. Proton only hot-starts it's second stage, the third one uses vernier engines that start before the main (and are thus used for ullage).

Regarding RO, do not change inclination in LEO. Ever. It's vital to launch into the same plane as your docking target, with high precision. Otherwise, inclination change can and will eat up most of your delta-V. It's actually more efficient to make a bi-elliptic transfer (raise your AP, change inclination, then lower it back down) than try to make a plane change at LEO speeds.

yeah the Proton thrid stage ... i told you months ago that i could be half the length

when you reduce the length of teh tank, it rely looks more like teh real life Proton. a white repaint? same paintjob like on the R-7 ? if yes, then do it !

Yes, after a closer look. I was most likely incorporating the length of Salyut into the third stage.

Basically the main motivation us to get some similarity between ALV and TLV, try and get a basic style established for Tantares LV

And ALV textures are quite wasteful currently!
